title: Stunning Luxury 1 Bedroom at The Villa Riviera!
posting_body: ['Stunning Luxury 1 Bedroom at The Villa Riviera!', 'Property Address', '800 E. Ocean Blvd.', '#310 | Long Beach, CA 90802', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Offered By', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'Description', 'An exquisite, historic, iconic 1 bedroom, 1 bath corner unit that offers a fusion of new and old.', 'With spectacular city views, the Historic Villa Riviera sits on the beach & the crest of Downtown Long Beach w/ a walk-about-lifestyle full of many venues in which to partake.', 'This unit has been tastefully remodeled to include newer bamboo flooring, a newly remodeled bath w/ walk-in shower, modern subway tile & includes new lighting, bath fixtures & vanity.', ' A stylish & efficient customized built-in home office area is located off the main living area.', ' The kitchen was reworked with the original shaker style cabinets w/ all new stainless appliances, lighting & stunning black granite counters to create a stylish but reminiscence feel to the galley kitchen that opens to the eating area w/ views of the city.', "Both the kitchen & eating area has lovely gray tile flooring that flows a dramatic & tasteful black tile entry that leads to the unit's main rooms, which will delight any visitor.", ' All utilities are included in the HOA, as well as cable & internet.', ' The building sits on the beach & is positioned to offer anyone an array of activities such as walking or biking the 7-mile bike path, strolling to the East Villa Arts District to grab a cup of coffee or wine at any one of a number of establishments.', 'Or perhaps dine and enjoy a gallery stroll to the Performing Arts, Shoreline Village, or movies.', 'Perhaps a bike ride to visit the Aquarium & much, much more.', 'For more information on this or any other available property, please contact Ernst & Haas Management at', 'show contact info', ', or visit us online at <URL> and apply today.', 'TO QUALIFY:', '• Credit score must be no less than 600', '• Monthly gross income to qualify must be 2 ½ times the rent', '• We do not accept past evictions, judgments, or collections from a management company or landlord', '• Renter’s Insurance is required.', 'Proof of coverage must be provided upon the signing of your lease.', '*Note - See selection criteria for a detailed list of qualifications on our website at <URL>', 'PLEASE BE AWARE OF RENTAL SCAMS:', 'We caution all applicants to be diligent in researching the legitimacy of any potential rental listing.', 'All deposits, rents, and rental agreements\xa0are ONLY executed at Ernst & Haas Management, 4120 Atlantic Ave., Long Beach, CA.', 'If you are being asked to fill out a third-party application or are being asked to pay cash or send money via an App, Western Union, Money-Gram, or Prepaid Visa card,\xa0STOP\xa0these\xa0are signs of rental listing scams used to defraud applicants.', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'DRE License #01251870', '*ALL INFORMATION DEEMED ACCURATE BUT NOT GUARANTEED.', 'APPLIANCES ARE PROVIDED AS A COURTESY AND ARE NOT MANDATORY TO THE LEASE.', 'TERMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.', 'Amenities', 'Stove', 'Refrigerator', 'Microwave Oven', 'On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Water Paid', 'Gas Paid', 'Electricity Paid', 'Trash Paid', 'Basic Cable/Internet', 'Gated Building', 'Elevator', 'City View', 'Beach Access', 'Corner Unit', 'Office Nook', 'Portable A/C', 'Radiant Heat', 'Pets Considered', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 865', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,250.00', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,300.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Small dogs allowed']
